name: Cows And Bulls Word Game
description: Game comes up with a four-letter word and the player tries to guess it. At each turn the player tries a four-letter word, and the Game says how close it is to the answer by giving: The number of Bulls - letters correct in the right position.   The number of Cows - letters correct but in the wrong position. The Player tries to guess the answer in the fewest number of turns.
